option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
FROM nginx:alpine
# Copy the static files to nginx html directory COPY src/ /usr/share/nginx/html/
# Expose port 80 EXPOSE 80
# Start nginx CMD ["nginx", "-g", "daemon off;"]

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
version: '3.8'
services: snake-game: build: context: . dockerfile: Dockerfile ports: - "3000:80" volumes: - ./src:/usr/share/nginx/html restart: unless-stopped
